creator: hauser@acm.org
text:
it provides only a directory listing, but no "Bug Database"
also trying http://www.modssl.org/support/bugdb/index.cgi yields "Internal
Server Error"

P.S.: Tried to take rse@modssl.org into the cc:, but this appears not to be
allowed...

creator: erik@codefaktor.de
text:
You're right, the mod_ssl Bug DB seems to be down, but the problem is another:
the info regarding mod_ssl support simply isn't valid anymore since mod_ssl is
now fully integrated into Apache and not only a 3P module as it was with 1.3.

I'll change this bug to LATER 'cause this will be fixed by a major rewrite of
the ssl docs.

creator: erik@codefaktor.de
text: Finally fixed now in both doc trees.
